about_the_game:
Ginnung is a tight platformer with simple and versatile movement for you to master. Perfect your escape in 50+ levels, and slay the monsters in your way! Set in a mysterious world of Norse spirits and Gods.

Gameplay

Ginnung is a movement focused platformer with speed and tight controls. Run, wall jump and dash your way with speed, whilst fighting the monsters that await you. This world is not where you belong. Master the levels and movement to ultimatly escape your Ginnung with style!


You can dash in any direction and will reset upon touching a wall or the ground. Gain extra dashes by bouncing off any projectiles. You can also dash towards the ground to gain a small speed boost, which will grant higher jump. Use this to find secret routes and collectibles hidden in the levels.

You are hunted by the spirits of this world. Use your trusty weapon to slay all that is in your way. Including a refletion of yourself, which you will battle in intense boss fights.

Last stand

If you are slain, you will enter Last stand. A second chance to complete the level. A death timer will count down if you are touching the ground. Try and stay airborne as long as possible to clutch up.


Overview

  • 60 Levels
  • Versatile and fast movement
  • Battle spirits in boss fights
  • Secret retro themed levels
  • Many secrets to find
  • Handcrafted levels for you to perfect
  • Controller support

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space

name: Ginnung

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You find yourself trapped in a void of Norse spirits, who are out to help you… or destroy you. Find your escape in this tight platformer with emphasis on speedrunning. Use the simple but versatile movement to the best of your ability!
